Version Differences Template

Route 1 - Wild Pokemon Encounters

Connect Pallet Town to Viridian City. Your first opportunity to encounter wild Pokemon.

Red/Blue Version:

  • Pidgey (45% encounter rate, Level 2-5)
  • Rattata (55% encounter rate, Level 2-4)

Yellow Version:

  • Pidgey (55% encounter rate, Level 2-5)
  • Rattata (35% encounter rate, Level 2-4)
  • Pikachu (5% encounter rate, Level 3-5) - Special encounter

Trainer Battles

All versions have the same trainer roster on this route.

Pokemon Information Template

Pikachu

Species: Pikachu

National Dex #: 025

Type: Electric

Locations Found: Route 25, Viridian Forest

Encounter Rate: 5% (Red/Blue), 20% (Yellow)

Level Range: 3-5 (Viridian Forest), 8-12 (Route 25)

Evolution: Evolves into Raichu with Thunder Stone

Notable Stats: Speed (90), Attack (55), Defense (40)

Moveset at Encounter:

  • Level 3: Thunder Shock, Growl
  • Level 5: Thunder Shock, Growl, Thunder Wave

Trainer Battle Template

Gym Leader Brock

Location: Pewter City Gym

Specialty: Rock-type Pokemon

Badge Reward: Boulder Badge

TM Reward: TM39 (Rock Tomb) - Only in newer games

Prize Money: $1,386

Team:

1. Geodude (Level 12)

Type: Rock/Ground

Moves: Defense Curl, Rock Throw

Strategy: Low-level, easy to defeat

2. Onix (Level 14)

Type: Rock/Ground

Moves: Screech, Bide, Bind, Rock Throw

Strategy: High defense, low attack. Watch out for Bide.

Recommended Strategy:

  • Use Water or Grass-type moves for 4x damage
  • Fighting-type moves are also effective (2x damage)
  • Avoid Normal, Flying, Poison, and Fire attacks
  • Bring plenty of Potions - Onix can be tanky

Counter Strategies:

  • Bulbasaur: Vine Whip defeats both Pokemon easily
  • Squirtle: Water Gun is very effective
  • Charmander: Very difficult - recommend catching Mankey on Route 22

Item Information Template

Rare Candy

Category: Medicine/Enhancement

Effect: Increases Pokemon level by 1

Value: Cannot be sold

Locations:

  • Cerulean Cave: 2 found
  • Route 12: 1 hidden behind fence post
  • Silph Co.: 1 on 2F
  • Victory Road: 1 hidden near ladder

Hidden Item: Rare Candy (Route 25)

Location: Route 25

Item: Rare Candy

Position: Behind the house near Bill's cottage

Description: Use the Item Finder to locate it more easily

Coordinates: 3 steps right, 2 steps down from the house door
